column1: The Pit Room////Have visited The Pit Room twice now and have tried the loaded Frito Pie with brisket
column3: turkey and jalapeno sausage. All were flavorful and perfectly seasoned. Moist
column4: juicy meat melts in your mouth. The Mac & Cheese is good as well. Overall
column7: staff professional and friendly. If you want an inside the loop alternative to Killen's BBQ in Pearland
column8: this is your best bet. Dining room is nothing fancy
column10: but very clean. They have a long bar area outside and a lot of outside seating. Parking is an issue though
column11: just not enough and they run out of items early sometimes
